typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "StashBlox: Deal already confirmed or canceled"

arguments.value: StashBlox: Deal already confirmed or canceled

balanceOf(address,uint256).details: Get the specified address' balance for token with specified ID. Attempting to query the zero account for a balance will result in a revert.

params.account: The address of the token holder

balanceOf(address,uint256).return: The account's balance of the token type requested

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: Get the balance of multiple account/token pairs. If any of the query accounts is the zero account, this query will revert.

params.accounts: The addresses of the token holders

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).return: Balances for each account and token id pair

createTokens(uint256[],address[],uint256.details: Function to mint an amount of a token with the given ID.

params.ids: ID of the token to be minted
params.recipients: The addresses that will own the minted token
params.values: Amount of the token to be minted for each recipient

isApprovedForAll(address,address).return: True if the operator is approved, false if not

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,ui.details: Transfers `values` amount(s) of `ids` from the `from` address to the `to` address specified. Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `from` account. If `to` is a smart contract, will call `onERC1155BatchReceived` on `to` and act appropriately.

params.data: Data forwarded to `onERC1155Received` if `to` is a contract receiver

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Transfers `value` amount of an `id` from the `from` address to the `to` address specified. Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `from` account. If `to` is a smart contract, will call `onERC1155Received` on `to` and act appropriately.

params.data: Data forwarded to `onERC1155Received` if `to` is a contract receiver

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Sets or unsets the approval of a given operator.     * An operator is allowed to transfer all tokens of the sender on their behalf.     * Because an account already has operator privileges for itself, this function will revert if the account attempts to set the approval status for itself.

params.approved: representing the status of the approval to be set

params._interfaceID: The interface identifier, as specified in ERC-165

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

isApprovedForAll(address,address).notice: Queries the approval status of an operator for a given account.

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Query if a contract implements an interface
